HealthKitItems.Name: Basic Health Kit
HealthKitItems.Description: A Bandage coated in a purple dust, this mesh will lightly heal most small wounds.

HealthKitItems.Name: Large Health Kit
HealthKitItems.Description: A Bandage littered with small purple crystals, it glows with a healing ambiance.

HealthKitItems.Name: Antidote
HealthKitItems.Description: A simple chemical spray that hits the throat, tastless but has an air of caramel about it

HealthKitItems.Name: Flame Retardent
HealthKitItems.Description: a rubber layering that will stop equipment from burning up
